Package xxl.core.indexStructures

Provides important index structures like B-trees, R-trees, M-trees and bulk-loading-algorithms.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Descriptor A descriptor describes the region represented by a given subtree.
 

Class Summary
BTree This class implements a B+Tree.
Descriptors This class contains static methods for descriptors.
GreenesRTree An RTree implementing the split-strategy proposed by D.
LinearRTree An RTree implementing the linear split-strategy proposed in the original R-Tree paper.
MTree An ORTree for objects with spheres as regions.
MultiDiskBTree This class implements a BTree which stores its leaf-nodes on multiple disks.
ORTree The class ORTree (Overlapping Region Tree) is a generic and highly flexible super-class that implements features used by grow- and post-trees which stores objects with descriptors which may overlap.
QuadraticRTree An RTree implementing the quadratic split-strategy proposed in the original R-Tree paper.
RTree An ORTree for objects with bounding rectangles as regions.
Separator This class describes the known separtors of the B+ tree.
SlimTree A dynamic tree for organizing metric datasets.
SortBasedBulkLoading This class provides functionality to bulk-load different types of trees.
Sphere This class implements a Descriptor that is a sphere.
Tree The Tree-class is a generic and highly flexible super-class that implements features used by grow- and post-trees.
XTree The XTree is a variant of the RTree for high dimensional data which avoids splits which would result in high overlap.
 

Package xxl.core.indexStructures Description

Provides important index structures like B-trees, R-trees, M-trees and bulk-loading-algorithms.
